oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discrete {(Gd4M)-M-III} (M = Gd-III or Co-II) pentanuclear complexes: a new class of metal-organophosphate molecular coolers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GUPTA, SK
DAR, AA
RAJESHKUMAR, T
KUPPUSWAMY, S
LANGLEY, SK
MURRAY, KS
RAJARAMAN, G
MURUGAVEL, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ENHANCED MAGNETIC COOLERS
PHOSPHATES
CLUSTERS
LIGANDS
FIELD
REFRIGERATION
RELAXATION
ANISOTROPY
FRAMEWORK
CHOICE
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The first examples of homo- and hetero-polymetallic organophosphates of gadolinium are reported. Magnetic measurements reveal a higher magnetic entropy change for the isotropic {Gd-5(III)} complex (25.8 J kg(-1) K-1) as compared to the heterometallic {(Gd4CoII)-Co-III} complex (20.3 J kg(-1) K-1), which is attributable to a change in magnetic coupling as estimated from DFT calculations.
